title: Korean attitude
body: im litterally done with having koreans in my games, they are the worst of the worst in terms of attitude, litterally both my promos just had to have 2 of these   to ruin my day, what is with them always wanting to "FF@20" and AFK in a winnable game, talking in korean and litterallly saying team is trash game lost. They complain and complain spam chat saying that everyone but thmselves are shit at the game. I can deal with this but not in my promos NO

replies.body:
Not only that they are some of the WORST players I've ever come across. I'm not sure because of the time difference but you can definitely tell the difference between saying a gold 2 Aus player and a overseas gold 2 player. There is definitely a skill gap between the two. Maybe it's because they mostly play against each other early mornings and that's how they got their ranks etc or I just have the worst luck in MM.

Most games I play after 2am are mostly downhill and losses due to non English speaking players playing like boosted animals.

Their internet is also the flakiest POS and I'm always having games with them constantly disconnecting, rejoining, blaming lag all game long.

Trying not to come across as racist here.
Yeah, I had a whole team who were speaking in an Asian language and all wanted to FF at 20, and they all voted yes when the enemy team was only a few kills ahead of us. lol
shouldn't koreans have a good attitude in every game since most koreans are like GODS at lol, so in the OCE server, they should have no problem in games.

Im Tired of the mother$%#@ing Koreans on this Mother^&*%ing server 

(PLS DONT BAN RITO ITS A QUOTE FROM A MOVIE WITH SAMUEL L JACKSON <3 )
